reviews.review_msg: This class is so redundant. Every week you write a discussion to the same people and don't get graded on anything until week 8 so you really have no idea what you are doing. The reflections are pretty much the same as the discussions so it feels repetitive. The readings are so old and overly complicated for no reason. I don't recommend.

this class was so enlightening! Heesoon is an amazing prof and really helps you think outside of the box. Weekly discussion posts and reflections and one Final essay. No exams!!! would definitely take this course again :)
Wonderful Class! Wonderful Prof! Forced me to re-coneptualize my views about, ummm everything! Time well invested!

This course was suppose to be an intro course... but even the TA admitted that it was more like a 400 level course.  Much too hard... and the lectures just suck... word of advice... DO NOT TAKE INTRO TO PHILOSOPHY OF EDUCATION!
